Scripts.OnLoad:
local T = unpack(Tukui) local Auras = T["Auras"]
Auras.Skin(self)
self:RegisterForClicks("RightButtonUp")
Scripts.OnEnter:
local GameTooltip = GameTooltip
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMLEFT", -5, -5)
if (self:GetAttribute("index")) then GameTooltip:SetUnitAura(SecureButton_GetUnit(self:GetParent()), self:GetID(), self.Filter) elseif (self:GetAttribute("target-slot")) then GameTooltip:SetInventoryItem("player", self:GetID()) end
